activities: openQ performs research for pharmaceutical and medical device companies. The company's research is gathered exclusively from manifestly public resources. The company provides said data to pharmaceutical companies, or in some cases, stores said information for them along with data provided by customers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: European Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
